Question
========
  
Prof. A. James is analyzing a survey. One of the scales contains 8 questions. When conducting a reliability analysis, she finds a Cronbach’s alpha of 0.455. Below is part of the SPSS output.

![](uu-Cronbach's-alpha-002-en-tabel.jpg)
  
If Prof. A. James needs to shorten the test, which of the four listed items would be the least suitable for removal from the scale?

Answerlist
----------
* Question 1
* Question 3
* Question 5
* Question 7

Solution
========
  


Answerlist
----------
* Removing item 5 would decrease Cronbach’s Alpha the most.
